profile:
Edmonton Flooring Experts
When it comes to flooring in Edmonton, there’s no one quite like Freedom Flooring. We offer a broad selection of quality brand-name flooring options, from carpet, LVP, and laminate, to hardwood and tile. Plus, we offer a full range of flooring services to Edmonton including supply, flooring installations, and repairs.

At Freedom Flooring, we’re about more than just quality flooring products. Our mobile flooring truck brings flooring samples directly to you, so you can see in-home what your new floor will look like. That way, you can compare flooring products, colours, and materials, conveniently and in the comfort of your own home. We also offer in-home inspections and bring our teams of flooring specialists to you for accurate quotes and professional advice. Get quality flooring products and expert installations from a local Edmonton company.

For all of your Edmonton carpet, hardwood or laminate flooring needs, let Freedom Flooring provide your next flooring solution.

We Have You Covered No Matter What Your Flooring Needs Are
Not only does Freedom Flooring provide the services of our convenient mobile flooring truck and our professional in-home inspections, but we have the flooring selection that ensures you’ll find the right product for your next renovation or upgrade.

Carpet
Selecting carpet for your space, whether it is a living room, bedroom, or other area, is a versatile and durable choice that has an array of added benefits and advantages.

Vinyl Plank
Vinyl plank is an ideal choice for houses, offices, and other spaces that experience high amounts of foot traffic. This is because it is 100% water-resistant, and provides a superior level of durability.

Laminate
Of all the flooring types, laminate is arguably the easiest to clean and maintain. Unlike hardwood, waxing isn’t required for laminate flooring. Instead, all owners need to worry about is vacuuming and the occasional mopping.

Hardwood
Aside from being available in a wide range of finishes and styles, hardwood flooring is also the most value-adding flooring type. If you not only want to enhance the visual appeal of your living space but also want to protect your real estate investment and secure the best possible return when the time comes to sell, hardwood is likely the ideal choice for you.

Tile
Freedom Flooring stocks a selection of styles, colours, and sizes of tile, making every effort to provide our customers with a comprehensive collection of options to choose from.

profile:
Perennial Masonry And Construction Inc. is a team of experts with decades of experience in the construction industry. We draw on long years of experience to provide top quality projects that will last a lifetime for you. All Perennial employees are fully trained and certified so you can be confident that you are hiring the best. We dont cut any corners on our work or with our customers. You can be assured of excellence and quality throughout your entire project.
We are a team of experienced service professionals, specializing in brick, stone, tile, block, landscaping and concrete work.
